name: The gloves of swordsman
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It decreases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It decreases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'slash'.
